string.value: I see Jacob, the garden caretaker over there! Why does he look so worried? Maybe I can lend him a hand.

I talked with Jacob, who's trying to expand his garden. He's sent me to gather #b25 Cherry Blossom seeds#k, #b10 Silk Feathers#k and #b10 Leather#k. I've heard that Sakura celions might have the blossom seeds. In return for this, he's agreed to give me some high-quality potions. I bet they taste delicious...
I got the materials that Jacob needed to expand the garden. He mentioned he might have more work for me if I needed it. I'll pay him a visit soon!
...Hello, how's it going, my friend? If I could steal a moment of your time, I have a most interesting quandary concerning my Sakura Garden. Do you have a moment to spare?

Fabulous! My name's Jacob and I run the Sakura Garden. I'm looking to expand the garden with some more trees and nice, leather sofas. However, I'm rather lacking in the materials department. A well-traveled being such as you should have no problem gathering #b25 Cherry Blossom Seeds#k, #b10 Silk Feathers#k and #b10 Leather#k. The Cherry Blossom Seeds come from Sakura Cellions. I recall seeing a few over in the Purple Plains area of Amoria, so you may want to check over there. The Silk Feathers are fairly rare, but I've heard through the grapevine that Jr. Lioners tend to shed them upon demise. Bring them back to me, and I'll give you some of my very best potions stock!
Ah, I understand. We are all stones in the river of time, my friend. If you change your mind, I'll be here.
Fine job! These will fit perfect for the garden. As promised, here are the potions. Enjoy! I've got another task for you when you're ready.
Thanks again for your assistance. Incidentally, I need some more help if you've got a moment.

How funny! You could make an easy living as a jester, coming back before the task was finished. You've amused me, now head back out there and get the #b25 Cherry Blossom Seeds#k, #b10 Silk Feathers#k and #b10 Leather#k! I'll be waiting.
